DOLCECategory.description: Fundamental categories from the DOLCE foundational ontology.

KnowledgeType.description: Types of knowledge elements within the CRM.

ActivityType.description: Types of activities performed within the CRM.

SoftwareType.description: Types of software integrated with or part of the system.

Organization.description: Represents a group of people with a particular purpose, such as a company, institution, or association.

Project.description: Represents a temporary endeavor undertaken to create a unique product, service, or result.

Location.description: Represents a geographical place or position.

Product.description: Represents an article or substance that is manufactured or refined for sale.

Event.description: Represents a planned public or social occasion.

Date.description: Represents a specific day in time.

MonetaryAmount.description: Represents a specific sum of money.

Time.description: Represents a specific time of day.

Thing.name: Thing
Thing.description: The most generic type of item.

UnrecognizedEntity.name: UnrecognizedEntity
UnrecognizedEntity.description: An entity that could not be classified into a known type by the NLP model.

original_text.description: The original text from which the entity was extracted.

WORKS_FOR.description: Indicates that a person is employed by or is a member of an organization.

PARTICIPATES_IN.description: Indicates that a person is a participant or a member of a project.

INVESTED_IN.description: Represents an investment relationship from an investor to an asset.

ACQUIRED.description: Indicates that one organization has acquired another.

MANAGES.description: Indicates a person has a management role over a project, fund, or deal.
